```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("raw_data/test.csv", sep = ";", encoding = "latin1")
```

```{r}
studiengang_unique <- unique(df$Studiengang)
```

```{r}
for (i in studiengang_unique) {
  df_unique <- df %>% filter(Studiengang== i)
  
  df_plot_qualitaet <- ggplot(df_unique,aes(x=Qualität))+
    geom_bar()+
    ylab("Anzahl")+
    theme_minimal()+
    ggtitle(paste0("Studiengang: ",df_unique[1,1],"\n\n Qualität"))
  
  df_plot_verbleib <- ggplot(df_unique,aes(x=Verbleib))+
    geom_bar()+
    ylab("Anzahl")+
    theme_minimal()+
    ggtitle(paste0("Verbleib"))
  
  arrange <- ggarrange(
    df_plot_qualitaet,
    df_plot_verbleib,
    ncol=1,
    nrow=2)
    
  ggsave(paste0("outcome/",df_unique[1,1]," - Plot.pdf"))
  
  
  
}
```
